thread.title: Virginia Anderson
thread.title_full: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance reviewed by Virginia Anderson

author: Virginia Anderson
title: Virginia Anderson
text: While in my policy my son and several accidents. Service was always timely and the claims adjusters are very nice. Customer service reps are great. They often help me save money on my policy.
